name: Prison Escape (JohnKesterJr)
description:
Before the game will take commands, the border right next to the game screen needs to be clicked by the mouse

The player's goal is to try and escape the prison by turning on all switches. Switches can be accessed by entering a zone with the switch's corresponding number. Upon entering a zone the player must rescue all of the prisoners in the zone before returning back to the main area to access the switch.
Press r to reset the game.
